entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 16.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 15.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
